transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.pageDescription: Manage your income and expenses to track your personal finances.
transactions.addTransactionDescription: Add your income or expenses to track your personal finances.
transactions.transactionAddFailed: Failed to add transaction! Please try again later.
transactions.transactionUpdateFailed: Failed to update transaction! Please try again later.

transactions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?

transactions.transactionNotFoundOrNoPermissionDelete: Transaction not found or you don't have permission to delete!
transactions.transactionFetchFailed: Failed to load transactions! Please try again later.
transactions.deleteTransactionDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the transaction "{description}"? This action cannot be undone.

categories.title: Categories
categories.pageDescription: Manage custom categories for your transactions.
categories.addCategoryDescription: Add a custom category for your transactions.
categories.categoryAddFailed: Failed to add category! Please try again later.
categories.categoryUpdateFailed: Failed to update category! Please try again later.
categories.categoryDeleteFailed: Failed to delete category! Please try again later.
categories.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
categories.accessDenied: Access denied! Please refresh the page and try again.
categories.categoryExists: Category with this name already exists!
categories.categoryKeyError: Error creating category key. Please try again.
categories.categoryInUse: This category is being used in transactions!
categories.noCategoriesDescription: You haven't created any custom categories yet. Add your first category!
categories.noCategoriesFiltered: No categories match your current filters.
categories.categoryNotFoundOrNoPermission: Category not found or you don't have permission to edit!
categories.categoryNotFoundOrNoPermissionDelete: Category not found or you don't have permission to delete!

categories.categoryFetchFailed: Failed to load custom categories! Please try again later.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Analyze your financial data with detailed statistics and insights.
statistics.noTransactionsDescription: No transactions found for the selected period. Try adjusting your filters or add some transactions.

settings.title: Settings
settings.appearanceDescription: Choose the display theme for the application.
settings.languageDescription: Choose the language for the application.
settings.languageUpdateFailed: Failed to update language! Please try again later.

home.title: Home
home.totalTransactionsTooltip: Total number of transactions (both income and expenses) you've made this month. Helps track your transaction frequency.
home.highestTransactionTooltip: Transaction with the highest value this month (could be income or expense). Helps identify unusual large amounts.
home.lowestTransactionTooltip: Transaction with the lowest value this month (could be income or expense). Helps identify frequent small expenses.
home.avgExpenseTooltip: Average amount per expense transaction (Total expenses / Number of expense transactions). Helps you understand your average spending scale.
home.savingsRateTooltip: Percentage of money you save compared to income ((Income - Expenses) / Income × 100%). Higher is better, should maintain above 20%.
home.popularCategoryTooltip: Category with the highest total amount this month. Helps you identify your biggest spending area or income source.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.fullNameTooShort: Full name must be at least 2 characters

userDataError.description: An error occurred while loading user information. Please try again later.
